metadata.title: CVE-2022-28388 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
usb_8dev_start_xmit in drivers/net/can/usb/usb_8dev.c in the Linux kernelthrough 5.17.1 has a double free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28388` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-188-generic - 4.15.0-188.199
linux-image-4.15.0-188-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-188.199
linux-image-4.15.0-188-lowlatency - 4.15.0-188.199
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-188-generic - 4.15.0-188.199
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-188-lowlatency - 4.15.0-188.199
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-121-generic - 5.4.0-121.137~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-121-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-121.137~18.04.1

No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-188.199').
